A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've created this account on RT just to say that this movie is fundamentally flawed and is a bad movie. Worst off it's an awful and boring Star Wars movie. Too much comedy\, invented plot devices just to get the moving going\, a lack of respect for the movies that came before it\, and did I mention it's boring? It torches all the previous movies and barley connects to The Force Awakens. The movie that came RIGHT before it. It's a betrayal of the Star Wars saga. And it's fans.
